game.name: Somniora: Chapter 1
game.shortDescription: Somniora is a horror-puzzle game. Get ready to delve into the adventure of our character, who is trapped amidst strange dreams, while searching for answers to the questions lurking in their subconscious.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Somniora is a horror-puzzle game. Get ready to delve into the adventure of our character, who is trapped amidst strange dreams, while searching for answers to the questions lurking in their subconscious.
